name: The Rapha Festive 500
description:
:

Normally I am a narrative designer and writer for games, I also speak at events (Indiecade, V&A, Gamecity, A MAZE, etc.) about activism in art, narrative design and writing, and I have a PhD in games against capitalism. You can find me on Twitter at @hannahnicklin, or my website at hannahnicklin.com
